name: Animal Companion
summary: You gain the service of a young animal companion (page 206) that travels with you on your adventures and obeys any simple commands you give it to the best of its abilities.

name: Crossbow Ace
summary: Your deep understanding of the crossbow allows you to reload efficiently while moving yourself out of the line of return fire.

name: Gravity Weapon
summary: Your expertise with your weapons and commitment to taking out your targets lends you magical power.

name: Heal Companion
summary: You have a deep devotion to your animal companion that enables you to magically heal their wounds.

name: Hunted Shot
summary: You take two quick shots against the one you hunt.

name: Initiate Warden
summary: You’ve trained with one of the ranger sects known as wardens, who practice a specialized type of primal magic.

name: Monster Hunter
summary: You quickly assess your prey and apply what you know.

name: Twin Takedown
summary: You swiftly attack your hunted prey with each of your weapons, potentially combining their damage into a single devastating attack.

name: Animal Empathy (Ranger)
summary: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level.

name: Favored Terrain
summary: You have studied a specific terrain to overcome its challenges.

name: Hunter's Aim
summary: When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate.

name: Monster Warden
summary: You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey.

name: Quick Draw
summary: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

name: Relentless Stalker
summary: Stay adjacent to your prey when they attempt to move away.

name: Snare Hopping
summary: You can magically move your snares around.

name: United Assault
summary: Through countless battles, you've learned you're stronger when working alongside your allies.

name: Advanced Warden
summary: You unlock more powerful primal spells.

name: Animal Feature
summary: You are so connected with the animal world that you can grant yourself an animal's features and abilities.

name: Companion's Cry
summary: You can urge your companion to do its utmost.

name: Disrupt Prey
summary: Make a melee Strike against your prey.

name: Far Shot
summary: Your experience in the field has taught you how to focus your aim at a distance, increasing your accuracy.

name: Farabellus Flip
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics; trained in medium armor
summary: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

name: Favored Prey
summary: You have studied a specific type of wild creature and can hunt it more easily.

name: Hunter's Luck
summary: Your recollection of monsters is magically enhanced by luck.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Magic Hide
summary: You can defend your companion in battle.

name: Running Reload
summary: You can reload your weapon on the move.

name: Scout's Warning
summary: You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger, granting them each a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls.

name: Snare Specialist
summary: You specialize in creating quick traps to obstruct your enemies on the battlefield.

name: Soothing Mist
summary: You have a connection to the healing properties of nature and can produce a magical mist to heal damage and stop burning or bleeding.

name: Twin Parry
summary: You use your two weapons to parry attacks.

name: Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
summary: With a bit of hide, some antlers, and some cast-off fur, you can create a disguise that will fool even an experienced hunter.

name: Additional Recollection
summary: You scan the battlefield quickly, remembering critical details about multiple opponents you face.

name: Ephemeral Tracking
summary: You are able to track your quarry through impossible places.

name: Masterful Warden
summary: Your mastery of warden magic increases.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)
summary: Your animal companion becomes a mature animal companion and gains additional capabilities (page 211).

name: Ranger's Bramble
summary: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns.

name: Skirmish Strike
summary: Your feet and weapon move in tandem.

name: Snap Shot
summary: You can react with ranged weapons when a creature is in close quarters.

name: Swift Tracker
summary: Your keen eyes catch signs of passage even when you’re moving.

name: Blind-Fight
summary: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

name: Can't You See?
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism; Expert in Stealth
summary: The eye rebels, the mind recoils—no matter how much those who can see you try to explain what's there, their friends' gazes just skitter over you, like a bird afraid to land.

name: Deadly Aim
summary: You aim for your prey’s weak spots, making your shot more challenging but dealing more damage if you hit.

name: Eerie Environs
prerequisite: Trained in Intimidation; Trained in Stealth
summary: The natural world can be scary to those not used to it—and you make it scarier still.

name: Eerie Traces
prerequisite: Trained in Intimidation; Trained in Survival
summary: The tracks you leave behind are strange, somehow disconcerting and unnerving—they might travel backward, or through places no one would think to pass through.

name: Hazard Finder
summary: You have an intuitive ability to sense hazards.

name: Quick Snares
summary: You can rig a snare in only moments.

name: Terrain Master
summary: You are able to adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain.

name: Warden's Boon
summary: You point out vulnerabilities present in your hunted prey, granting the benefits listed in Hunt Prey and your hunter’s edge to an ally until the end of their next turn.

name: Camouflage
summary: You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness.

name: Dazzling Display
summary: You perform a bewildering show of prowess, such as by whirling and flashing a weapon, that unnerves foes.

name: Eerie Proclamation
prerequisite: Expert in Occultism; Expert in Survival
summary: You know there are places in the world that are just wrong— places where the birds don't sing and where you always feel like you're being watched.

name: Enlarge Companion
summary: You make your companion enormous.

name: Hunter's Vision
summary: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses.

name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Master Monster Hunter
summary: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world.

name: Peerless Warden
summary: Your mastery of primal magic has given you access to the greatest secrets of warden magic.

name: Penetrating Shot
summary: You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey.

name: Powerful Snares
summary: Your snares are particularly dif cult for enemies to avoid.

name: Terrain Transposition
summary: You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it.

name: Twin Riposte
summary: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

name: Warden's Step
summary: You can guide your allies to move quietly through the wilderness.

name: Distracting Shot
summary: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered.

name: Double Prey
summary: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down.

name: Obscured Emergence
summary: You are, by nature, a thing of gloomy woods and barren wilds, and when you choose show yourself, a bit of this gloom clings to you, obscuring your form with strange distortions or mist.

name: Second Sting
summary: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.

name: Side by Side (Ranger)
summary: You and your animal companion fight in tandem.

name: Warden's Focus
summary: Your connection with your surroundings deepens and expands, allowing you to draw in more of nature’s primal power as you focus.

name: Lightning Snares
prerequisite: Master in Crafting; Quick Snares; Snare Specialist
summary: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.

name: Sense the Unseen
summary: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues, such as their minute movements or the shifting of air currents on your skin.

name: Shared Prey
summary: Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey.

name: Stealthy Companion
summary: You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings.

name: Targeting Shot
summary: You carefully track your prey’s position and defenses.

name: Warden's Guidance
summary: You convey your prey’s location to your allies with a series of careful words or gestures.

name: Greater Distracting Shot
summary: Even a single missile can throw off your enemy’s balance, and more powerful attacks leave it flustered for longer.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
summary: At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a Twin Riposte.

name: Legendary Monster Hunter
prerequisite: Legendary in Nature; Master Monster Hunter
summary: Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey.

name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Ubiquitous Snares
summary: You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you’re ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes.

name: Warden’s Reload
summary: Your mastery of magic and weapons like the crossbow allow you to wield both with equal ease.

name: Impossible Flurry
summary: You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed.

name: Impossible Volley
summary: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

name: Manifold Edge
summary: You’ve learned to leverage every possible edge.

name: Masterful Companion
summary: Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease.

name: Perfect Shot
summary: After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain.

name: Shadow Hunter
summary: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain.

name: Warden's Wellspring
summary: You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you.

name: Accurate Flurry
summary: You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

name: Impossible Snares
summary: You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

name: Legendary Shot
summary: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would affect your ranged attack.

name: Mimic Protections
summary: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well.

name: Superior Sight
summary: Increase your visual acuity.

name: Time Dilation Cascade
summary: You borrow a bit of time from the future to act now.

name: To the Ends of the Earth
summary: Your ability to track your prey has surpassed explanation, allowing you to trace your prey’s movements and predict its location with ease.

name: Triple Threat
summary: You can divide your attention three ways when hunting.

name: Ultimate Skirmisher
summary: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain.
